name: Futurama
description:
Futurama is an arcade game developed by Unique Development Studios. It was originally released in 2003. Vivendi Universal Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Futurama on GameCube, PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
It was produced by Anders Hejdenberg and Mars Westerlund. It was directed by Stephane Koenig. It was scored by Christopher Tyng.
